price: Sesungguhnya kalau mereka beriman dan bertakwa, (niscaya mereka akan mendapat pahala), dan sesungguhnya pahala dari sisi Allah adalah lebih baik kalau mereka mengetahui.
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَمَثُوبَةٞ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞۚ لَّوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw annahum āmanū wa-ittaqaw lamathūbatun min ʿindi al-lahi khayrun law kānū yaʿlamūna
